title: ★ The Talk Show Remote From WWDC 2021, With Craig Federighi and Greg Joswiak
content:
Special guests Craig Federighi and Greg Joswiak join me to discuss the news from WWDC 2021: the all-new multitasking interface in iPadOS 15, on-device Siri, new privacy controls in Safari and Mail, MacOS 12 Monterey, and more.

Brought to you by these outstanding sponsors:

  • MacPaw — Get started with the free version of CleanMyMac X: http://bit.ly/CleanMyMacX_WWDC2021 and install Setapp to get 200+ curated Mac apps for free: http://stpp.co/JohnGruber
  • Flatfile — The data onboarding platform for any company that relies on migrating data from point A to point B, as intuitively as possible: https://flatfile.com/df
  • Linode — voted the Top Infrastructure as a Service Provider by both G2 and TrustRadius. Use this link and get $100 in credit when you create a free account: https://linode.com/thetalkshow
author: John Gruber
